website_summaries.verdict: A trio of bestsellers designed specifically for curly hair. Set includes no-poo cleanser, conditioner, and mini towel.
pros: No-poo cleanser cleans curls without stripping out natural oils, which helps lock in moisture and definition
Set includes a microfiber towel for drying hair fast without creating frizz
cons: It may take time for hair to adjust to a no-poo formula

customer_reviews.title: Not cost efficient/cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: You are better off buying the shampoo/conditioner on the DevaCurl website. They have sales pretty often and then after you spend a certain amount, you get free samples or a free Deva Curl towel. The towel that comes with this set is marketed as the original Deva Curl towel (grey, bigger than a hand towel, and very nice microfiber), however what you get is a dumbed down version for Amazon that is smaller than a hand towel (see picture) and is cheap like the microfiber cloths you can use to wash your floors. I’m disappointed in the deceiving marketing and Amazon accepting such a cheap product replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It's devacurl!
customer_reviews.text: For all those who are trashing the towel, it clearly states on the PRODUCT DESCRIPTION and BOX, that it includes a MINI towel. That's why this bundle is affordable and for those who want to try the curly girl lifestyle before they spend $$ on liters of conditioner. I received exactly what was described and shown: 1 mini Deva towel, and two 8 oz bottles: 1 of low-poo original, and 1 of one condition original. Product came in one day, package unharmed and unopened. Choose your sellers wisely, do your research. Then you won't be disappointed when you receive fake garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Damion Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: First, the con. The microfiber towel is the size of your average bar towel, smaller than a kitchen towel. There is no way to wrap it around your head. Now the pro. This product is fantastic for thirsty frizzy curly hair. It doesn't have a strong fragrance. It is thick and penetrating. Perfect for my unruly hair. It is gentle enough that it does not irritate my extremely sensitive skin (other products have caused break out and rashes). I'm very pleased and would order again.

Then gently let it run through the rest of my hair. My hair is clean and it doesn't get tangled. Then I use the conditioner and then do a quick rinse through leaving some on my hair. I found the curl cream keeps the curls better than another brand I tried. All together works well.

product_meta.title: DevaCurl How to Quit Shampoo, Cleanse & Condition Kit
feature_bullets: No-poo, one condition & devatowel combo: if you want to give your curls a dose of essential moisture, then you've come to the right cleanser & conditioning combo. the original no-poo & conditioner is a must-have for soft, hydrated, frizz-free curls. the shampoo and conditioner are great for a deep condition for tired, dull, dried out curls. use the devacurl mini towel to absorb excess water and get soft, bouncy, defined curls.

No-poo original: the no-poo original is a zero-lather conditioning cleanser. this hydrating shampoo keeps hair healthy and hydrated. the moisturizing, non-lathering formula with peppermint and grapeseed oil, stimulates and cleans the scalp and hair without stripping away the natural oils your curls need. no-poo leaves you with shiny, bouncy curls that are just plain gorgeous.

Original conditioner: the devacurl original daily cream conditioner locks in moisture for healthy hair. this rich, creamy conditioner is made with moisturizing olive oil and nourishing botanicals to deliver softness and hydration. its herbaceous scent of lemongrass is lush and refreshing.
Anti-frizz microfiber mini devatowel: this towel helps smooth dry wavy, curly, and super curly hair that is prone to frizz and flyaways.
Devacurl promise: all devacurl products are 100% sulfate, paraben and silicone-free. they are also vegan, wheat, and cruelty-free.
